Class Stage

java.lang.Object
pl.gda.pg.elektronikaodpodstaw.levels.Stage
public class Stage extends Object
Represents a single stage in game. A stage can either be a question-answer stage or a simulation-based stage, depending on its configuration.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final String
    correctAnswer
    The correct answer for the question, if applicable.
    private final boolean
    isAnswerStage
    Indicates whether this stage is a question-answer stage.
    private final String
    question
    The question associated with this stage.
    private final String
    simulationParams
    Simulation parameters for the stage, if applicable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Stage(String question, String simulationParams)
    Constructs a simulation stage with the specified question and simulation parameters.
    Stage(String question, String correctAnswer, boolean isAnswerStage)
    Constructs a question-answer stage with the specified question and correct answer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(String question, String correctAnswer, boolean isAnswerStage)
      Constructs a question-answer stage with the specified question and correct answer.
      Parameters:
      question - the question text for this stage.
      correctAnswer - the correct answer to the question.
      isAnswerStage - a flag indicating whether this is a question-answer stage.

    • Stage

      public Stage(String question, String simulationParams)
      Constructs a simulation stage with the specified question and simulation parameters.
      Parameters:
      question - the question text for this stage.
      simulationParams - the correct parameters for the simulation. The isAnswerStage field is set to false, and the correctAnswer field is set to null as this constructor is specifically for simulation stages.

  • Method Details

    • getQuestion

      public String getQuestion()
      Returns the question associated with this stage.
      Returns:
      the question text.

    • getCorrectAnswer

      public String getCorrectAnswer()
      Returns the correct answer for the question, if applicable.
      Returns:
      the correct answer, or null if not applicable.

    • getSimulationParams

      public String getSimulationParams()
      Returns the correct simulation parameters for this stage, if applicable.
      Returns:
      the simulation parameters, or null if not applicable.

    • isAnswerStage

      public boolean isAnswerStage()
      Checks whether this stage is a question-answer stage.
      Returns:
      true if this is a question-answer stage; false otherwise.
